title: Gods judgements upon drunkards, swearers, and sabbath-breakers. In a collection of the most remarkable examples of Gods revealed wrath upon these sins with their aggravations, as well from scripture, as reason. And a caution to authority, lest the impunity of these evils bring a scourge upon the whole nation. By W. L.
author: Hammond, Samuel, d. 1665.
notes: Title page and leaves A2, A6, B3.6, C3-8, F2, and F3 are cancels.

Divisional titlepages: Of blaspheming the name of God, by cursed oathes. With the judgements of God upon cursers & swearers (G1r); Of the Sabbath day, with Gods judgements upon the profaners thereof (I1r).
In fact, by Samuel Hammond--Wing (CD-ROM edition).
